main.name: Zohaib Shaik
main.bio: Hi there! I have been very passionate about computers and programming since my university life. I dream to be an expert software engineer so that I can build professional and useful software that has business value. I am looking for a junior software engineer position in a reputed software company that can help me to achieve my goal.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project

projects.title: College Fest Webpage
projects.description: A college fest webpage designed for a competition which consists of lists of the events that are heppening in the college reminders and registrations etc.

projects.title: Personal Bookshelf
projects.description: A personal bookshelf application developed using ReactJs and Open Library API as part of an assignment which covers the basics of ReactJs. and Open Library API.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: An Expense tracker using Streamlit with Firebase connected to it encorporated features-Monthly expenses and deployed in the Streamlit Community Cloud

projects.title: Water Qality App
projects.description: An application to check the quality of water using Flask and HTML and CSS This project aims to develop a machine learning application for water quality analysis.

projects.title: E- Commerce Website
projects.description: The project is a dynamic e-commerce website developed using React. It features a UI with a homepage displaying various product categories along images

projects.title: Chat_With_LLM-s
projects.description: This Project integrates Streamlit with locally installed LLMs, facilitating active interaction with them which was designed using Streamlit..
